class.name: RenderSceneDataExtension
class.brief_description: This class allows for a RenderSceneData implementation to be made in GDExtension.
class.description: This class allows for a RenderSceneData implementation to be made in GDExtension.

method.name: _get_cam_projection
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the camera [Projection].

method.name: _get_cam_transform
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the camera [Transform3D].

method.name: _get_uniform_buffer
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the [RID] of the uniform buffer containing the scene data as a UBO.

method.name: _get_view_count
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the view count.

method.name: _get_view_eye_offset
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the eye offset for the given [param view].

method.name: _get_view_projection
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the view [Projection] for the given [param view].
